Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2014 02:17PM buddywalkr wrote: I have been on Xgeva for almost 3 years now and have never had any side effects.   I don't consider the occasional bone twinge a side effect.  I was on Aredia prior to that for about 1 1/2 years.   I prefer the shot to the infusion by far.
